body: Adding the symbol here will add tf.layers.maxout (but not tf.layers.Maxout, the object-based version). In tensorflow, since 1.0, we are promising full backward compatibility on all APIs which are not in tf.contrib. Since maxout was just added I don't think it deserves full backward compatibility promises yet. So I prefer that the symbol is added to tf.contrib.layers.{Maxout,maxout}
